thread.title: Wheelchair user creates mannequin to target disabled consumers
thread.title_full: Wheelchair user creates mannequin to target disabled consumers - BBC News

author: BBC
title: Wheelchair user creates mannequin to target disabled consumers
text:
British businesses could be losing out on a potential £420 million a week by failing to target disabled consumers.
Sophie Morgan is an artist who designed the 'Mannequal' – a wheelchair for mannequins that is both a style guide for wheelchair users and a symbol of inclusivity.
Producer: Laura Westbrook
